root.name: Phantasy Star II Text Adventures
root.description: The Eight Game Storylines: Shilka's Adventure ( Shir Gold) Amia's Adventure ( Anna Zirski) Huey's Adventure ( Hugh Thompson) Eusis's Adventure ( Rolf Landale) Nei's Adventure ( Nei) Rudger's Adventure ( Rudolf Steiner) Kinds's Adventure ( Josh Kain) Anne's Adventure ( Amy Sage)
